AddNoiseToSignal.code:
class AddNoiseToSignal:
    def __init__(self, points, mean, variance):
        import random
        random.seed(0)
        with_noise = []
        for p in points:
            x, y = p
            y += random.gauss(mean, variance)
            new_p = (x, y)
            with_noise.append(new_p)
        self.points = with_noise
